name: Thoughtworks
description: Founded in 1993, Thoughtworks grown from a small team in Chicago to a leading technology consultancy of more than 11,000 Thoughtworkers across 51 offices in 18 countries. Our cross-functional teams of strategists, developers, data engineers and designers bring more than 30 years of global experience to every partnership. Thoughtworks invented the concept of distributed agile and we know how to harness the power of global teams to deliver software excellence at scale. Today, we help our clients create their own path to digital fluency and to build organizational resilience to navigate the future.

ShortDescription: Thoughtworks is a global technology consultancy that integrates strategy, design and engineering to drive digital innovation. For 28+ years, our clients have trusted our autonomous teams to build solutions that look past the obvious.

Highlights.name: Digital Transformation Experts:
Highlights.description: Thoughtworks positions itself as a leading global technology consultancy that integrates strategy, design, and software engineering to help clients thrive in today's digital landscape.

Highlights.name: Focus on Innovation
Highlights.description: They emphasize their 30+ years of experience at the forefront of digital innovation, which translates to expertise in creating adaptable technology platforms, designing user-centric digital products, and leveraging data and AI for maximum value

Highlights.name: Knowledge Sharing
Highlights.description: The website highlights their Thoughtworks Technology Radar, a unique tool that shares insights and recommendations on the latest tech trends. This radar, updated twice a year, helps clients stay informed about the evolving tech landscape.
